portfolio.title: Event Manager
portfolio.description: A web application for managing events, built using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Passport, Twilio, Stripe, and Nodemailer.

portfolio.title: StrateGix
portfolio.description: Stratetix: Dynamic tax site with advice, calculations, quiz, to-do list, and glossary. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, EJS, Node.js, MongoDB, Stripe, Nodemailer.

portfolio.title: YelpCamp
portfolio.description: Developed the Yelp Camp website, showcasing my proficiency in web development. This full-stack project incorporates CRUD functionality, interactive maps using Mapbox, and user authentication with Passport.
